title: `--cache` flag not working

labels.name: core
labels.description: Relates to ESLint's core APIs and features

labels.name: accepted
labels.description: There is consensus among the team that this change meets the criteria for inclusion

labels.name: archived due to age
labels.description: This issue has been archived; please open a new issue for any further discussion

body:
**Tell us about your environment**
It's just a simple testing setup. I made a new node package, installed eslint, `--init` with standard config, and dropped in a folder with a single .js file in it. The hierarchy is like this: `proj\test\test.js`

* **ESLint Version:** v4.14.0
* **Node Version:** v6.2.1
* **npm Version:** 3.9.3

**What parser (default, Babel-ESLint, etc.) are you using?** default

**Please show your full configuration:**

<details>
<summary>Configuration</summary>

```json
{
    "extends": "standard"
}
```

</details>

**What did you do? Please include the actual source code causing the issue, as well as the command that you used to run ESLint.**

I'm trying to use the `--cache` option, but I can't get it to work. I've also tried specifying a `--cache-location`, but it doesn't help.

```bash
C:\Users\RyanM\Desktop\proj>node_modules\.bin\eslint test -c .eslintrc.json -o out --cache
C:\Users\RyanM\Desktop\proj>node_modules\.bin\eslint test -c .eslintrc.json -o out --cache --cache-location .eslintcache
```

**What did you expect to happen?**
A `.eslintcache` file should be created in the CWD, or wherever I specify the cache-loaction.

**What actually happened? Please include the actual, raw output from ESLint.**
No `.eslintcache` file is created that I can find.

Here's the output when I add the `--debug` option
```
eslint:cli Running on files +0ms
eslint:config Using command line config .eslintrc.json +0ms
eslint:config-file Loading JSON config file: C:\Users\RyanM\Desktop\proj\.eslintrc.json +0ms
eslint:config-file Loading standard +295ms
eslint:config-file Attempting to resolve eslint-config-standard +2ms
eslint:config-file Loading JS config file: C:\Users\RyanM\Desktop\proj\node_modules\eslint-config-standard\index.js +1ms
eslint:glob-util Creating list of files to process. +0ms
eslint:ignored-paths Looking for ignore file in C:\Users\RyanM\Desktop\proj +0ms
eslint:ignored-paths Could not find ignore file in cwd +1ms
eslint:config Constructing config file hierarchy for C:\Users\RyanM\Desktop\proj\test +713ms
eslint:config Using .eslintrc and package.json files +1ms
eslint:config Loading C:\Users\RyanM\Desktop\proj\.eslintrc.json +3ms
eslint:config Using C:\Users\RyanM\Desktop\proj\.eslintrc.json +1ms
eslint:config Using command line config file +1ms
eslint:config-ops Using config from partial cache +0ms
eslint:config-ops Apply environment settings to config +2ms
eslint:config-ops Creating config for environment es6 +1ms
eslint:config-ops Creating config for environment node +1ms
eslint:cli-engine Processing C:\Users\RyanM\Desktop\proj\test\test.js +0ms
eslint:cli-engine Linting C:\Users\RyanM\Desktop\proj\test\test.js +1ms
eslint:config Constructing config file hierarchy for C:\Users\RyanM\Desktop\proj\test +12ms
eslint:config Using .eslintrc and package.json files +1ms
eslint:config Using command line config file +1ms
eslint:config Using config from cache +0ms
eslint:linter Linting code for C:\Users\RyanM\Desktop\proj\test\test.js (pass 1) +0ms
eslint:linter Generating fixed text for C:\Users\RyanM\Desktop\proj\test\test.js (pass 1) +544ms
eslint:text-fixer Applying fixes +0ms
eslint:text-fixer shouldFix parameter was false, not attempting fixes +1ms
eslint:cli-engine Linting complete in: 589ms +552ms
```
